issue.title: [CF 873] Invert cooldown sweep option
issue.body:
Quote:

Hi, another question I wanted to ask:

Are we able to reverse the cooldown sweep directly? Specifically speaking, I'm asking about a Combat Event icon I made, which has a reversed timer sweep (it's going from low opacity to full opacity) for some reason.

It looks like all Combat Event icons have their cooldown timer sweep reversed. Is this normal?

http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/tellmewhen?comment=4260


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #873 | Raw

comments.body:
Added in g039b557c


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
